author: Al Jazeera
title: Russia’s invasion of Ukraine: List of key events from day 17
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 17th day, we take a look at the main developments.
content: Fight­ing north­west of Kyiv con­tin­ues as cities of Kharkiv, Cherni­hiv, Sumy and Mar­i­upol en­cir­cled by Russ­ian troops.
